bill.title: "Honoring Patients' Assignment of Benefits Act"; establish.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Honoring Patients' Assignment Of Benefits Act; To Define Certain Terms Used In This Act; To Require Covered Entities To Pay Benefits To A Nonparticipating Health Care Provider Who Renders The Same Service As A Participating Health Care Provider That Is Covered For Payment Under The Health Contract; To Require The Nonparticipating Provider To Provide Written Notice Of Assignment Of Benefits; To Prescribe The Process By Which Payments Shall Be Made; To Penalize A Covered Entity That Fails To Make Timely Payments; To Prescribe The Method To Be Followed To Correct The Wrongful Payment Of Benefits; To Require That Notice Of A Dispute Regarding The Legitimacy Of A Claim Or The Appropriate Reimbursement Be Provided Within A Reasonable Time After Receipt Of The Claim; To Provide That Acceptance Of An Assignment Is Not An Acceptance Of The Covered Entity's Fee Schedule; And For Related Purposes.
